title: Fresh views on the Wars of the Roses
itunes:title: Fresh views on the Wars of the Roses
itunes:subtitle: Dan Jones is interviewed by Tudor expert Suzannah Lipscomb about his new book on the Wars of the Roses. The two historians discuss the writing of popular history, the role of medieval kings and the controversial figure of Richard III, among other thing...
description:
Dan Jones is interviewed by Tudor expert Suzannah Lipscomb about his new book on the Wars of the Roses. The two historians discuss the writing of popular history, the role of medieval kings and the controversial figure of Richard III, among other things.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
Dan Jones is interviewed by Tudor expert Suzannah Lipscomb about his new book on the Wars of the Roses. The two historians discuss the writing of popular history, the role of medieval kings and the controversial figure of Richard III, among other things.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
